akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1397n–7. Limitation on use of funds Of the amounts made available to carry out this division, the Secretary may not use more than $2,000,000 in any fiscal year to support the review, approval, and oversight of social impact partnership projects, including activities conducted by—(1) the Federal Interagency Council on Social Impact Partnerships; and
(2) any other agency consulted by the Secretary before approving a social impact partnership project or a feasibility study under section 1397n–3 of this title.
(Aug. 14, 1935, ch. 531, title XX, § 2058, as added Pub. L. 115–123, div. E, title VIII, § 50802(2), Feb. 9, 2018, 132 Stat. 280.)
(1) the Federal Interagency Council on Social Impact Partnerships; and
(2) any other agency consulted by the Secretary before approving a social impact partnership project or a feasibility study under section 1397n–3 of this title.
